website_summaries.verdict: This is a good value on a compact scale that measures to 0.001 ounces and comes with a cover.
pros: Very accurate weight at a low price
Reset button helps you weigh individual items
cons: Not as accurate at weighing items less than 3 grams

customer_reviews.title: Best $11.59 you will spend!
customer_reviews.text: Check out the video it says it all. Scale is extremely accurate and easy to use. Listen if it lasts a year or two, you are way ahead of the game. Don't waste your money on a more expensive scale. I have a 600 dollar scale at work and I had the same results as this scale so save your money. I was not paid or did I receive any compensation for this review!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Lang

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This scale is amazing. Easy to figure out how to use, very precise. Also, the night after I got it my cat knocked an entire shelf of dishes onto the floor, the scale amongst them. There amidst a multitude of shattered porcelain, the scale was intact (and still works accurately), so it must be pretty durable. Very happy with my purchase, and now I want to weigh everything I own.
customer_reviews.author: E Warren

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive scale exceeded my expectations. I also ordered a set of weights ranging from 5 grams to 100 grams. With these weights I can weigh from 5 grams to 190 grams in five gram intervals. I have weighed these weights around a dozen times and get nearly identical results every time -- to 1/100th of a gram. That is remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Scientific Baking

customer_reviews.title: 1. Not accurate 2. Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Did the nickel test. Worked the first few times. The pictures with two different nickels (lucky to get them at 5g) never got them to equal out at 10g with just two of them. I like measurements to be accurate and the weight is worse off using the trays. Second update on replacement. Worked well! Used the trays, used paper, used nothing at all, and the nickel test was accurate. Thanks for the speedy replacement. I was a little weary of even getting a second and going with a pricy one, but this gets the job done and I’m happy with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gemini Rose

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews for products, but this I felt I had to. This scale is NOT at all accurate, and as I tried weighing my first item, the scale started at one number and then steadily decreased for several minutes with NO change whatsoever in the item, pressure, etc. There was no reason for this, but the scale did not weigh accurately at all, and I have now wasted my money as this is outside of my timeframe to return. Don't bother buying this scale - apparently, it's cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: C. Riot

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate. Inconsistent.
customer_reviews.text: The scale does not make reading...it continually fluctuates. The weight is constantly changing. I’m talkng a 10gr fluctuation. Not satisfactory. At all.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scale for vaping
customer_reviews.text: I make my own eliquid and have gone through a few different scales. This one is hands down the absolute best! It comes with a really awesome protective case that keeps the scale safe from any semblance of pressure being put on it. It is a great size for some larger bottles, would accommodate a good sized condiment bottle, so I don't have to mix small batches of stuff. And the measurement of the scale goes up high enough so that I can mix larger batches (250ml). Don't hesitate for a moment. If your intended purchase is for vaping, then buy this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Scale under $20
customer_reviews.text: This is a proper scale. It is very consistent and accurate plus it looks cool. I had purchased another scale, just a basic pocket scale with only 0.1g but it didnt work well at all even after calibration. I ordered this scale and it worked flawlessly out of the box. Even with it at 0.01g increments this scaled weighed the same item with identical weights before/after calibration. Dont waste your time with this other cheap BS! Spend the money, get this one. Having the piece of mind knowing that you are weighing exact measurements every time is worth it alone!
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: I would have given this 5 stars but had to send the first one back
customer_reviews.text: But the merchant was VERY proactive and send me another immediately. I wouldn't buy this unit unless you have a standard, such as 100gr, to calibrate it. The first one I got was not accurate, and would not calibrate. But the second one was a little off when I got it but calibrated dead nuts. Very compact unit, easy to read, and comes with a nice plastic protective "shell" for your case.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Roger L. McCarthyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this product (again)
customer_reviews.text: The scale has scratches and at least one small dent on it. I bought it to weigh things that are a fraction of one gram, they don't even register on the scale. The small item I've managed to weigh is .23 of a gram. I would not buy this again nor would I recommend anyone else buy it. (just my $.02)
customer_reviews.author: RBC

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever had, I love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had many different digital socket type steals over the last dozen or more years. I am extremely happy with this one. A bigger plate. Great display / read out. Easy function. Great options, and features. I wish I would have been using this one years ago. But so glad I found it. I know it may be common sense for many people, but if you're weighing or measuring small lightweight items, then add a large coin, or some weight on to the plate first, and then Tare it with that weight on, and then continue to start weighing or measuring your small lightweight items
customer_reviews.author: RoadTrip Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I love all the decimal places. And it seems quite confident in it's decisions. Actually very confident. It's super easy to get just the weight you want. It saves me a ton of time when I fiddle with recipes because I can do very small batches accurately. Just don't set it where the home A/C or Heater blows air on it. It will feel the breeze pressing down on it and lose it's confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought "ALLINONE Gram Calibration Weight 1G 2G 5G 10G 20G Scale Calibration Weight Set for Digital Scale Balance and 1 Piece Calibration Weight Tweezer" to test out the scale and it was 100% correct with every weight. Just use that description to find the weights - they were like $3. Very easy to use. I use it to measure espresso output from grams of espresso grounds to extraction output. I can fit a portafilter on it but just barely. Either way it works and is awesome and $12. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Stampfle

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate, but repeatedly wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Just not a good quality scale. I took a chance on the low price, but got what I paid for. Using a calibration weight, it is off .07g consistently. so, if that margin of error is ok for you, it will be fine. The base sits on three legs on the table top because it is racked or warped, so I suspect with any real weight on it, it will struggle as well to maintain any accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: W.D.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd Bought it Sooner; it is great!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this scale! I bought it to weight the representative bars from my soap batches. Each bar gets weighed weekly to monitor weight-loss, which is primarily water loss. When the representative bar stops losing weight then that batch for soap is usually fully cured. Even though soap can be used before a full cure, the soap is better when cured. Anyway, the precision of this scale is allowing me to know just what is going on with my soap with no guesswork. It is so nice to have the readability to the 1/100 of a gram.
customer_reviews.author: floridatamar

customer_reviews.title: Measures medicine great. Small amounts great/Amounts over 2lbs not so great
customer_reviews.text: This scale didn’t measure over 2lbs. I ended up returning it and getting a kitchen scale from Walmart for $15.00 which measures up to 10lbs. This scale is good if you are measuring medicine or tiny items.
customer_reviews.author: Rolanda~ CJs Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Low price point good looking and accurate for me needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these so far, and I will probably buy more. I work with error coins, and I needed a scale that would go down to 0.00 grams (hundredths of a gram). This scale will do that in grams, as well as in ounces. Overall, a pretty good looking, calibrated scale for general use. I was actually surprised at the price since a hundredths of an ounce/gram scales can get pretty pricey. I am not weighing anything extremely valuable on this scale so it serves the purpose for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but great.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying this scale has to be one of the tiniest scales I've ever seen lol. I guess I should have read the specs but never imagined it would be this little. It's very accurate though so it does it's job. I bought it to measure out ingredients for my bath and body products so I'll be needing a bigger scale for bigger batches as the big bowls will be to large to be able to see the screen. This is a great little scale though. Just need something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale is very accurate and worked well for a few years. Eventually, the button to change units didn’t work anymore so I could only weigh in ounces, but I need to measure in grams to sell cocaine very accurately. Lol. Jk. No cocaine here. I use this to weigh food and Kratom powder. The button may have stopped working from getting too much Kratom powder in it. Not sure. But, for the price, I got my money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: It Died
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to weigh out small amounts of powder to make up a mixture. I used it when I got it in July 2018 and have not needed it since so it sat on my shelf. When I needed it again December 2019. It was dead. I changed the battery but it only reads nonsense in grams only. I don't know when it started to fail, but it is totally useless now. Totally shocked that the reviews were so good! I never expected this! I definitely would NOT buy this again and I recommend to anyone reading, that you do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Mar Go

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed, small, accurte, durable, dependable
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale for what it is: small, accurate, durable and dependable for measuring our coffee every morning so we have the perfect brew, accurate for measuring butter added to our brownies, and small enough put in the drawer unnoticed. The scale comes with two clear plastic covers; one that covers the weight platform and protects the mechanism from drop hazards, and a second clear plastic cover that slips over the entire unit and doubles as a weighing pan. They're good for what we're weighing - let's hope they last long enough for their price
customer_reviews.author: 2LuckyDogs

customer_reviews.title: Its a great kitchen scale
customer_reviews.text: It works really well, its responsive and consistent when measuring fine materials. I also like the blue screen, it just looks and works good. I also appreciate the storing setup, that it has a cover which protects the weighing plate when not in use. I had another scale that I bought which was broken from the beginning probably because some kid in the store decided to squeeze the package. But this one is good because it has the cover to keep it from being damaged. A very good buy, would buy again except hopefully I won't have to haha
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not level on a flat surface
customer_reviews.text: My device is not level on one corner. I tested extensively on different flat surfaces, and it wobbles if I press on the scale with my finger. So far it doesn’t seem to move when the overall weight is light. But I think I’d have an issue with heavier loads. So I’ll have to monitor closely and eventually figure out a way to fix this. Too bad because otherwise it is an accurate scale.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Wong

customer_reviews.title: Good Scale, Bad Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Works for my needs. The only issues are the back is hard to get to put the batteries in and the batteries that came with the scale didn’t work. I put them in and the scale didn’t come on, so I took them out and accidentally dropped on and it fell apart. It’s still a good scale, which is why I didn’t take off points for it. But just be prepared with backup batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Update: the seller provided a very reasonable resolution which was satisfactory to me. They back their products 100%. my case could have been an exception. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ i literally received and opened the scale right now. I haven't got to test the scale. my negative review is for receiving a scale that seems to be used. with tons of scratches, fingerprints and even a hair! the "Pls remove this cover before weighing!" sticker had been clearly peeled off and re-sticked again! at this point i don't even care about the accuracy of the scale, if i was looking for a used scale, i could have got one for a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kors

customer_reviews.title: the scale is super accurate and sensitive
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time buying this scale because my first one broke. I constantly spilled water and oil so it's understandable that it's not working anymore. But since this is kitchen scale, shouldn't it be waterproof? But how can I expect so much from such a small, cheap scale? However, I had to give 4 starts since it's not waterproof and I know I have to buy another one if the new one breaks again. But other than that, the scale is super accurate and sensitive. It's a good scale. It measures from 0.001 oz to 16 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Sent From Earth

customer_reviews.title: Lost accuracy quickly
customer_reviews.text: Despite gentle handling this went from perfectly accurate to much less accurate. 0.001oz / 0.01g accurate it is not anymore. I'd say today it is 0.01 oz and 0.1 g accurate. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: LFP

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but it does have some quarks
customer_reviews.text: It comes with 2 covers: 1 for the whole assembly and one to cover the actual scale. The cover for the whole assembly sits on top (it doesn't latch), so you have to hold the whole assembly from the bottom or else the scale could slip out. The auto-off timer customization doesn't seem to work despite following the instructions. I would like to make the timer to a shorter time but I cannot successfully customize the timer. But fundamentally this scale is accurate. I tested with brand new 1g, 2g, 5g, 10g, and 20g weights and the scale correctly measured each weight.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gupta

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed with this scale because it malfunctions😡
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst thing I have purchased on Amazon. This scale malfunctions and can't get accurate weight readings. I can't imagine how anyone could put this kind of product up for sale! Who are the people writing those good reviews about this scale? Are they paid to write those reviews? If it's the same scale I purchased they are singing it's praises, then something is not right! I've wasted my hard earned money purchasing what turned out to be useless to me👎
customer_reviews.author: Bisi

customer_reviews.title: This scale is sensitive and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little scale for weighting up to 500 grams (1.1 lbs). It's sensitive to 0.01 gm and it's accurate as checked by weighing known volumes of water. I also used it to weigh out small pamphlets in batches of 25, 50, or 100, rather than counting them individually, which is a time saver. It's a keeper! Don't hesitate to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: DAC_Houston

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This little (made in China) scale is amazing! My advice to protect this VERY SENSITIVE little scale is to keep it in all the packaging that it comes in. With a scale that is so sensitive that it will read your blowing on it. You need to protect it. I use it for measuring ingredients in my bread making and would highly recommend it to those who like accuracy in their cooking recipes. Hope this helps Rachel's Dad
customer_reviews.author: pugsplz

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this scale for 4-5 months now, maybe longer to weigh out liquid. It's great, and I finally had to change the batteries a few days back. For as much as I have used this I can't believe they lasted that long. I do not have weights to test but I did weigh some US quarters and it was spot on. Especially for the price, I highly recommend this scale!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Watson

customer_reviews.title: For Espresso! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got mine for espresso and showed it in a video review on YT called Top Ten Barista Express Tips. It’s not perfect and probably a little off. Mine requires some calibration with a 100g weight that I need to buy now. I think just make sure to keep it clean, calibrated and on a hard surface and for 10 bucks you can’t beat it. I know I could have bought a nicer scale but for my home espresso needs, this works!
customer_reviews.author: James Patton

customer_reviews.title: Scale is accurate, build quality is what you would expect for the price
customer_reviews.text: We tested the scale with calibrated weights when it arrived and it proved to be quite accurate, even at lower weights, though I would not go below 50 grams or so. It is fairly sensitive to placement, so make sure you're on a sturdy, level surface. The build quality is correlated to price, with the buttons being the evident weak spot. In this, the smaller version of the scale with actual plastic buttons will prove to be more durable whereas the film 'buttons' on this one will end up being the reason this will eventually fail, most likely. Still, for the money one cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in November 2018. It has died in October 2020. It worked well for about a year, then it started to have intermittent issues with buttons working on the first press. After about 20 months, it would take 10 or more "power" button presses to get it to turn on. This month, it finally would not turn on, even after installing new batteries. I realize this is an inexpensive product, but it should last for more than 100 uses.
customer_reviews.author: A. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware....
customer_reviews.text: <GDealer Scale 10/8/18 - 2/20/19 Rest In Peace> It came on time and intact. Worked well for 135 days.....now it no longer weighs accurately and will not tare back to 0.00. This scale is kept in a drawer at all times and is handled with caution while being used quite regularly in the kitchen. Glad I purchased the calibration weights which let me know it became inaccurate....I suppose a refund is too much to ask!
customer_reviews.author: Singer

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: This scale does work, but if you need to be accurate with very small weights (.01 grams) the scale has trouble picking up the change in mass. The workaround I have used is to gently push down on the scale after I add a small amount of whatever I am weighing, and sometimes it will help pick up the added mass better. For $12 it will weigh things and work decently, but it isn't as sensitive as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, pre-calibrated, accurate, so far so good
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Inexpensive, no calibration involved, responds quickly, and for measuring food portions seems plenty accurate. Someone mentioned the vendor's name gets you wondering who the target market is ("Good Dealer!") CONS: Only has a 1 year warranty--some other similar scales in the price range have longer, I've had other scales of this type, one lasted 4 years, another 4 months, so we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: PMC

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this product was well-designed. The plastic cover that goes directly on the scale covers the surface of the plate without touching it. Very smart. Many scales are damaged due to being uncalabrated because they are improperly stored. This design prevents this. Also appreciate the weight capacity. Wish that it was a little bit more sensitive. Dont think it measures anything less than a gram well. Great for price.
customer_reviews.author: Mint

customer_reviews.title: This is an OK cheap scale
customer_reviews.text: I only really use this scale for coffee. It has a nice bright screen, easy to read. It doesn't seem to be the most consistent - like measuring the same thing twice you might be slightly different results. But for most of your every day kitchen type measurements, it is perfectly fine. The only thing to caution about is the low (500g) max capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and sensitive
customer_reviews.text: choosing one of these little scales is difficult from the vast number of similar items and disparate reviews. This one is a good one. Accurate and sensitive and simple to use. I’ve had no issues and I’ve been using it daily for my coffee for a few months. Update 2/16: I just had a chance to test the accuracy with lab weights and it checked out perfectly up to 50 grams, where it was .07g off, and at 100g it was .08 off. Really impressive!
customer_reviews.author: detour

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: The screen is not as bright as the other scale I got that looks exactly like this and it's not as sturdy. The weight measurements are also slightly off.
customer_reviews.author: Drum3Matrix

customer_reviews.title: Off by 100%
customer_reviews.text: Weighed a 'known weight' (calibration wt.) 50g weight and compared weight on another digital scale. The GDEALER DS1 indicated a weight of 100g whereas the other digital scale weighed the 'known weight' as 50g.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Total crap and jumpy. You take something off and put it back on and it will weigh a different amount. The instructions say to put the calibration weight on and calibrate it if it's not working properly. Maybe you could have included the calibration weight with the scale??? Now I've got to go through the annoyance of returning it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Consistently effective at a good value
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this scale for coffee making. It does the job extremely well and accurately. The only reasons I docked a star is that there's a limitation to the amount of weight that can be put on, which is relatively low. The moment I put on a mug with coffee, it will usually overload the scale. It works very well however with small amounts of mass. I keep the plastic covering over it when not in use to prevent dust/crumbs from getting into the scale mechanism, which is exposed without it.
customer_reviews.author: D L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly calibrated and portable
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly calibrated straight from the box. Checked with weights from my more expensive scales and consistiently keeps an accurate calibration. Bought for reloading and works perfectly for weighing powder and sorting bullets.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: this thing is amazing... very precise and dependable
customer_reviews.text: very good for measuring grams of dried flowers herbs and spices
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy in doubt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale to measure ultra light weight items e.g. spices as advertised. When I received it the written instructions stated words to the effect that weights under 2 grams may not be exact. I am troubled by that, but will report later after some use. Since the scale is new to me my rating on durability is based upon faith. It is a very nice looking scale and seems to perform very well.
customer_reviews.author: alanjesq

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I really like my Etekcity counter scale but need led a small one for travel. I didn't want to spend $50 on a travel scale and when I came across this, I decided to give it a shot. This thing is the perfect size for my needs (small enough to easily pack but not so small that I can't put a good container on it to weigh out accurately). It also comes with a nice hard plastic case to keep it safe in my travel bag or suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: N.K.

customer_reviews.title: It's more precise than others more expensives
customer_reviews.text: You don't need to search anymore. I bought others more expensives, costing 05 times more that do not shows small differences on the decimal range. This is cheap, precise and have everything you need for expresso. Add a coffee distributor/ leveler (link below), adjust your grinder and extract the same expresso taste ever; The best product no matter the price.
customer_reviews.author: VLAMIR HABIB

customer_reviews.title: Simple, accurate, durable
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen gets MESSY so I have dropped this thing twice onto tile flooring BUT it still works with 99.9% accuracy. Best way to test accuracy is with a new US dollar bill. All US bills weigh almost exactly one gram! This scale is sensitive enough that I have to turn off the A/C when I am using it because it will measure the wind blowing onto it. Screen is bright and the buttons are durable, easy to use. Not sure if it is water proof by design but I spilled chicken broth on it without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Wardian

customer_reviews.title: why are the numbers going up and down randomly?
customer_reviews.text: Every time I turn it on, the numbers start going crazy before I put anything on it. Then when I put something on it, the numbers go up and down. Maybe I got a bad one? Maybe I'm not using it correctly? It's annoying because I just wanted to quickly weigh some jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: catgirl

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this while out of town for work. I wanted something small as I am currently in an apparent. One I arrived home I was excited to set it up and start making vitamins. I opened and red the instructions thoroughly. The device won't register any weight, not a gram or pound. I attempted trouble shooting using the included instructions with no luck. I had to dig my old bulky scale out of storage. I am hoping to contact Anazon and get a replacement or refund. Although I may be too late.
customer_reviews.author: Cody E

customer_reviews.title: Great scale at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good scale. It does need a separate set or weights to calibrate it, which in general is no problem. However, the product description should include the specific weight needed for calibration so you can buy the weights at the same time. I don't know if the weights vary, but mine is asking for a 500g weight for the calibration. Other than that, the scale is fast and is accurate against my 100g and 50g weights. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KaptkaosTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: but this is a really nice piece of engineering
customer_reviews.text: It may sound silly for such a 'cheap' product, but this is a really nice piece of engineering. You may find yourself wanting to weigh stuff just for the pleasure of using it. Reproducibility (precision) is excellent. I haven't checked it against a calibration weight so I can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: I like the scale
customer_reviews.text: I have the same scale from a different seller that lasts me about 2 years. I compared both scales today and found out the covers of this scale is not as nice as my old one. However, the scale is fast and accurate. I guess I can live with it. I am happy with the scale and hope it will last
customer_reviews.author: Y. Y. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Nice scale, but not liquid safe
customer_reviews.text: I've had this scale for over a year, and it's great for measuring small ingredient amounts - salt, zest, yeast, etc. The one shortcoming that I'm taking off a star for is that the design is not liquid proof - there's a gap between the base of the scale and the measuring plate that lets liquid into the electronic guts of the scale, and this is ultimately how my scale died when I splattered some hot sauce into it from a blender mishap. If the body was sealed, this would be even better. At this price, not bad, though!
customer_reviews.author: B. Day

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is as accurate as I would expect for a sub $20 mini digital scale. I’m using it for microgram measurements & although it doesn’t need to be exactly precise it seems to be within .01-.03 for accuracy. I use the tare option each time & this is where I see a slight fluctuation but results are 2 out of 3 re-measurements is exact. Not too bad. Great purchase so far. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: CeceP

customer_reviews.title: Decent experience
customer_reviews.text: Scale didn't work at first which was disappointing. Maybe it was just a defective one. The seller did offer to send me out and other one and I agreed. So far so good with this one so props to them for taking care if that. Hopefully it withstands for a little while. / Update. Still working well. Justvwatch the calibration. . I'll ne is set at 500 grams calibration and doesn't put a calibration weight with it. If you put something not weighing that it will throw the weights off until correctly calibrated. Overall though for the price this is good and works well. And the seller continued to contact me to make sure I am happy. I appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Onder Ansary

customer_reviews.title: great price, good precision, small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to weigh cheese cultures. I was quite impressed with this little scale especially for the price. Out of the box, mine has good accuracy and repeatability (±0.01g) when moving the item around the stage. The size of the stage is quite small so it cannot replace my larger kitchen scale for things that require greater capacity, such as baking bread. But the small size also means it doesn't take up a lot of extra space which makes storing 2 scales easier.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not good for an espresso scale
customer_reviews.text: Someone reviewed this and recommended for use as an espresso scale. That was a bogus tip. The portafilter on my espresso machine is beyond the weight capacity of this thing, so measuring the weight of my dosed coffee is not possible. I could measure the cup as I pulled an extraction, so it worked fine for that part. Otherwise, it's a nice compact unit that seems to do the job ok.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great Little scale
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high expectations for this scale. The price point was just way too low for it to be any good. Long story short, it's been a great little trooper. Take it wherever I go, and it's always dead on. (I have a higher end scale at home, and it always reads the exact same when I double check) Very happy with this purchase and I will be getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Great range and precision for many things - but not for a kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This scale has an excellent balance of range and precision, and its accuracy is great. I use it for soapmaking. I like high accuracy and precision so that I can get consistent results. It would also be appropriate for jewelry, chemistry, and other tasks where you weigh small things carefully. It isn't the right range for a kitchen, so I don't know why they call it a kitchen scale.
customer_reviews.author: Raeyin

customer_reviews.title: An amazing little scale
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale and the seller is also super helpful. When I first ordered, the scale that I received was broken. I contacted the seller, and they were so helpful and sent me another one, which works perfectly. It's perfect if you're using the Breville Barista Express and weighing your shots. It shows up to two decimals, which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: TRASH.
customer_reviews.text: Never gone out of my way to write a review except for now because this scale is complete crap. I normally use aws but I got this one because of the large square surface after my last scale just stopped turning on after 3 years... Except when I turn this scale on, the scale numbers start immediately jumping, even with nothing on it climb in weight. Every time I hit the tare button it would return to zero and begin the same thing again almost instantaneously. Kinda crazy but it’s a piece of crap I was looking forward to. As far as scales, stick with AWS. Never disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Alex McMillin

customer_reviews.title: Great scale for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this for weighing brewing salts. 100g calibration weight registered 100.32g out of the box. Calibration was simple. Includes a tray that doubles as a case. Very well packaged. Each component had protective wrapping. Batteries included. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Useful scale, but inhales batteries
customer_reviews.text: A set of batteries lasts about a week in this scale. Fortunately I use Eneloop rechargeables, so it isn't expensive to change the batteries every week. But beware. The scale does measure very small quantities (hundredths of ounces). For the price, it's a decent scale. But use high quality rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Imprecise
customer_reviews.text: This scale is imprecise. I weighed a nickel and it showed 5.00g. After taking the nickel off, turning the scale off, turning the scale on, and putting the nickel back on, it was a slightly different weight. I tried this for various items on various surfaces and got the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great scale at a low price. However, the scale cannot calibrate. One of the few scales on Amazon that can read to.00 grams at a 500-gram capacity. Comes with a wide tray that is also the cover when stored. I bought some M1 calibration weights and the scale performed perfectly. Sometimes the scale has trouble weighing items over a long time. However, I just turn the scale off and then on again and it works fine. Very portable and professional looking. Great accuracy on all the area of the scale and not just the middle. I would like to see a calibration option, but overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hackworth

customer_reviews.title: Good scale for my reef tank
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Bought this for measuring and dosing right amount of dry chemicals and media for my reef tank. Dry chemicals such as sodium nitrate are so much cheaper than the liquids marketed to aquarists. Pick up a scale like this and save some money
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: nice scale, very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: i've used this more often than i thought i would and it's very accurate. calibrated to hundredths of a gram and repeats weights are right on. bulk supplements and medicine dosage for me and the dog ;) nice looking scale with transparent dust cover/holding tray included.
customer_reviews.author: ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for coffee or anything hot
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this scale but my search continues.. I purchased this scale to make coffee, but it will not take anything warm/hot on top of it or else the sensor will read as overloaded.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Unrepeatable results
customer_reviews.text: I can't get an accurate reading with this scale. When weighing and subsequent re-weighing, I never get the same reading. I can't recommend this for this reason. I like the rest of the features but the main feature (weighing) doesn't work right.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - definitely buy this
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Using it as an espresso scale to measure shots. It overhangs the front of my drip tray a little but it works awesome and way way way cheaper than some of the specialty scales. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: HI Ed

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty great scale
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty great scale. The packaging is cheap but effective, it reacts reasonably quickly to changes in weight, and its .01g increments are way more precise than the .5g increments on my previous scale. I'm using it to measure out coffee beans and so far it seems much more consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Zvan

customer_reviews.title: Nice little scale with trays
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little 500g scale the second I had bought of this type. The first worked well for years but did not take a seven foot fall off the top of the fridg well so I bough another. I expect the same great performance, ease of use and the concentric pans that both protect and double as trays are a nice feature, keeping the whole unit compact.
customer_reviews.author: DW-SF

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for recipes.
customer_reviews.text: This scale was too small for the bowls I used. i couldn't trust it for accuracy because it kept flickering different numbers when I added tare and add more ingredients. That Flickering is why I returned it, I bought the Ozeri Zk420 for my replacement.
customer_reviews.author: milissa

customer_reviews.title: Accurate right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I have some standard gram weights and the first thing I did after installing the included batteries was to test the scale with the standards. I used every combination and the scale was 100 percent on the nose. The count function wasn't as accurate (using quarters) but that wasn't as important to me. I like the plastic tray/cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ilove Electronics

customer_reviews.title: Accurate enough
customer_reviews.text: Accurate enough. Weight below 5g seems to be very slightly off by .02g-.03g. Fine for weighing small rodents that are typically over 10g anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Need non-skid bottom
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything, except that they do not have non-skid bottom. There’s just pastic feet on four corners and they slide so easily. I almost returne it - then I found these non skid sticky dots left over from some ikea furniture and that totally save it.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: very fragile it broke with in one week. very ...
customer_reviews.text: very fragile it broke with in one week. very sensitive to dust.. would probably be ok in a very clean environment.. it just started to fall apaprt. I've bought somethinkg more substantial... maybe my fault for using it in a dusty enviremonet. but the buttons stuck the 3rd time I used it and the case broke/ It was 11 bucks I really couldn't have expected much more. jd
customer_reviews.author: Proudhon

customer_reviews.title: Be careful to handle the platform
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed to measure small amounts of ingredients for baking. The size was perfect for my purpose and it seemed to be accurate. Unfortunately, I accidentally pull the platform of my scale pretty hard when I tried to take it out from a drawer. One side of the platform slightly bent upward and the scale stopped working. I tried to push back in to fix it but failed it. I had to order another one to replace it.I wish the product were little bit more sturdy built so I would be able to give it five star.
customer_reviews.author: mkg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scale
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that it is small. I do like that it is very easy to use & very accurate compared to other scales. I use the scale to accurately measure firework chemical firework compositions. I recommend this scale to anyone who wants to measure accurately and quickly. The exact moment you push the tare button there is no hesitation like there is on other scales. This product is Quick, Easy, & very Accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to weigh materials for mixing ceramic glazes. It's worked very well for that purpose. If one were mixing 10K gram batches, then one might go for a larger scale, but this works fine for test batches. Over the past few months it's been banged about a bit, but works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: b0hb

customer_reviews.title: Fine for $10 but keep a nickel around to calibrate it before each use
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as a baker’s scale. It’s too small to weigh flour but I can use it for other ingredients in grams. The accuracy kinda sucks: Every time I use it, I have to calibrate it by weighing a nickel and adjusting the tray until the proper weight is displayed. It’s okay for a cheap scale.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not as specified or calibrated correctly
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 2 of these. 1 calibrated at 500g the other calibrates at 100g? Now I have to buy a 100g when it specifies it calibrates at 500g. Kinda annoyed honestly because mine were NOT calibrated accordingly upon being received. Even bought weights to calibrate and still off
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Never worked right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife for her birthday. When she opened it, put fresh batteries in, and tried it out, it would not weigh anything over 3 ounces. We have tried everything to make it work. It is useless. I would not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted and needed- thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with my purchase. This is easy to use and easy to clean. The scale works for what I needed. The batteries worked and the scale came ready to use. I love the two trays provided for weighing. I haven’t had any issues this far and it’s been months. I’d buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This scale does not even sit flat on a flat surface. Scale body is slightly warped. No rubber feet on bottom either. Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: RyeBread

customer_reviews.title: I've never seen such a TINY amount of gardening product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use next year on my zucchini plants, to rid them of zucchini borers that killed my plants for the last 2 years, so I can't speak to how well it works. What I CAN say is that the bottle pictured on the site SEEMED MUCH larger than the tiny bottle that came! It took up about 1/2 the half-page sized manila mailing envelope, & fit into my mailbox. It was rather shocking.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month
customer_reviews.text: I used this scale about 5 times. Now, a month after buying it, it doesn't work at all. It constantly shifts back and forth between 1 and -1 oz, and then says "UnSR" (no idea what that means). I can't return it now, it lasted up until the return window was over, now it's useless. Please just spend the extra $5 and get something that will last
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure on accuracy?
customer_reviews.text: US bills are supposed to weigh 1 gram. Weighed several $100 bills individually and in groups. Results varied from .85 to 1 gram. All were relatively new. Not sure whose correct, the device or US government?
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Still accurate after a year or so.  It's a solid high quality scale at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this scale for quite a while and I can't complain about anything regarding this scale. As long as it's size meets your needs, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cubae

customer_reviews.title: Would be OK if it worked
customer_reviews.text: Our unit would continuously drain the batteries when turned off. Tried with several sets of batteries, making sure the scale was not left on, but all were completely dead after 24 hours. Update: the seller contacted me and sent a new unit free of charge. Hard to argue with that. I am still disappointed the first unit was defective, but updating to 4 stars for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scale! And I got it for a great price. I was sooo surprised with how well it all fits together. The scale comes with two clear measuring platforms that fit nicely on the scale. For storage, one slides over the actual scale platform and the other over the whole scale making storage soooo easy and fast. This is my favorite scale since it is small, accurate, and easy to use. My only down side is when measuring for baking, the scale can be overloaded by some of the bowls I would use with my last scale, but for a small pocket scale, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Carden

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: These scales are worthless, it is randomly inaccurate as much as 100+ g. Do not buy!!! Hello, I bought two of these scales both are worthless to me. They are randomly inaccurate calibrated or not. They are just no good period! Very very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: piss off bad quality
customer_reviews.text: just tried fir the first time. very bad quality. look nice but doesn’t work correctly. have to throw away. so piss
customer_reviews.author: Van Le

customer_reviews.title: Can't way more than 500g and it messes up and glitches out constantly
customer_reviews.text: I could hardly even use this scale. It's super touchy and sensitive and as I was making a recipe and adding ingredients, weighing each one by grams, it would suddenly glitch out and give an error message for no reason. Sure it's cheap, but there's a reason for that. It's also a lot smaller than I was expecting. Would not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!! It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need.... Very easy to use and easy instructions... Working great so far.. I will update later on... Great product so far light weight and accurate 👍
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: I use it to prepare my e-juices and it works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This scale is super small and looks well built. It has quite accurate readings. I use it to prepare my e-juices and it works great for me. In fact, buy another to give to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Tabata

product_meta.title: GDEALER DS1 Digital Pocket Kitchen Multifunction Food Scale for Bake Jewelry Weight, 0.001oz/0.01g 500g, Tare, Stainless Steel, 12710619mm, Silver
feature_bullets: Accurate - This GDEALER scale equipped with high sensitivity gravity sensor and wide range, weigh up to 500g. Readings in units: g/ct/dwt/ozt/o
Perfect Design - ABS plastic frame and stainless steel plate make the scale durable and light. LCD display with blue backlight makes it available at night.
Multi-function - The counting feature gives you an accurate count especially for food. Precision Tare Button
Widely Use - The two transparent plastic cases are perfect to weigh items such as fruits/liquids/food seasoning.

Quality Guarantee - ***1 Year Warranty Customer Service***: GDEALER offers 1 year warranty for all food scales sold by Global Dealer. Contact us via Amazon message box if you meet some issues or have some advice.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,667 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
